text: Jat Chuen (), previously Jat Min, is one of the 41 constituencies in the Sha Tin District in Hong Kong. The constituency returns one district councillor to the Sha Tin District Council, with an election every four years. The Jat Chuen constituency is loosely based on Jat Min Chuen, Shui Chuen O Estate, Tsok Pok Hang San Tsuen and Shan Ha Wai, with an estimated population of 19,634. ==Councillors represented== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1994 | rowspan=2| Lam Hong-wah | Civil Force |- |style="background-color: " | | 2014 | NPP/CF |- |style="background-color: " | | 2011 | rowspan=2| Yau Man-chun | Neo Democrats |- | style="background-color: " | | 2016 | Independent |} ==Election results== ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ==References== Category:Sha Tin Wai Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sha Tin District Council Category:1994 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1994
title: Jat Chuen (constituency)
